actionableRecommendations.title: Create Centralized Test Utilities
actionableRecommendations.description: Found 36 duplicated test patterns. Create a shared test utilities module.
actions: Create /src/test-utils/setup.ts for common test setup patterns
Create /src/test-utils/helpers.ts for renderHook and async utilities
Update test files to import from centralized utilities
actionableRecommendations.estimatedImpact: Reduce test code by 20-30%, improve test maintainability

actions: Extract AudioContext mocks to shared module
Extract MediaRecorder mocks to shared module
actionableRecommendations.estimatedImpact: Improve test consistency and reduce mock maintenance
